name: Leap and Shoot
description:
Leap and Shoot

Navigate through this zero gravity environment using the least amount of actions to get to the final exit.
You play as an astronaut who is trying to escape from a collapsing space station.

Leap across the rooms and shoot the buttons to open your way.
Be quick and efficient with your actions, and try to beat all levels under PAR.

Commands:
  • Click to leap
  • Click while in the air to shoot
Attributions:

This game was inspired by Second Fridge, a game by Nerdspartan.
All sprites and some audio effects by Kenney.
Music was made by me using BeepBox.
Sound effects by:

  • Leszek_Szary
  • Stereo Surgeon
  • FullMetalJedi
  • ShaneF91
  • Za-Games
  • philRacoIndie
